name: Moses Finds His Roots
description:
Use the arrow keys and spacebar to jump and find the roots of the Egyptian prince Moses! based on the Bible Exodus chapters 1 and 2. Was unable to add music and was unable to add a win screen, so when you find the Egyptian Princess, you have won the game.

Credits: 

Created by sketche99 / Elijah Leon

Unity Assets used:
SpeedTutor Main Menu - Speedtutor
Egyptian Cartoon Pack - LumoArt 3D
Egpytan Town People - BitGem
Character Movement Fundamentals - JannOtt
Character Pack Free Animal People - SuperCyan
Taichi Character Pack - Game Asset Studio
